titulo: Next generation distribution substation for increasing the system resilience
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:Improved observability, monitoring and control of the electricity distribution grids;Optimised management (including maintenance) of the grids by system operators and improved system resilience (including withstanding natural hazards and cybersecurity incidents);Grid operators integrate in their practices real-time decision-making. These could be assisted by artificial intelligence (AI) algorith
